summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Comptroller to accept the sum of One ($1.00) Dollar from the Seamen's Institute in full, of all rentals for that portion of the property of the Seamen's Institute condemned for street purposes, under Ordinance No. 18,109, from the date of the entry of said judgment up to the date that the city shall order said Seamen's Institute to vacate said portion so condemned.
